maxBlastForce - Variable in class com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.ProjectileTypes.Explosion
The maximum blast force an object can experience from a single ray, this must be set to a reasonable amount to prevent objects at very low distance to the center receiving extremely high values due to the divide by distance ^ 2
maxHealth - Variable in class com.berbils.game.Entities.FireEngines.FireEngine
The maximum health the fire engine can have, this is what it starts off with when it is spawned or reset
maxHealth - Variable in class com.berbils.game.Entities.Towers.Tower

maxRange - Variable in class com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.ProjectileTypes.Projectiles
The max distance in meters the projectile can travel before being destroyed, acting the same as if it had collided
maxWater - Variable in class com.berbils.game.Entities.FireEngines.FireEngine
